name: places/ChIJrTUFYYT2wokREGfLp9Qm6TM
adrFormatAddress: 3834 Broadway, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I used Susies service’s from 2015 until 2021. On and off while in nursing school and straight out of Connecticut. Every room i ever rented i found thru her and they were all decent with good people. No lie. I can’t believe all the bad reviews i am reading on her. I dont speak a lick of spanish but i trusted her and she delivered every single time. Idk if her services went down during covid or what but im sorry to see all the negative experiences. She may seem shady but if you are respectful and patient with her she will deliver. I am not a family member or friend of hers and im not being paid to write this. I think i’ve rented 4 rooms through her in that span of time and they all we’re good with decent people. All in Washington heights. I even referred others to her and she has helped them. Please give her a chance!

originalText.text:
I came here back in 2010 and again this past November, and Suzie found me a room in my budget on both occasions the same day I came.

I now have a very spacious room with nice furniture and a full sized bed with my own fridge and a very nice roommate.

Also have WiFi and an AC and all for only 200 per week. This was my experience, surprised to see all the bad reviews.

She does charge a fee and gives the breakdown of total cost to move in to the place in writing that requires a signature. Not a scam, would come again if I need to in the future.

originalText.text: WARNING. Please check every post here and THEN make your decision. I am not sure if she is a scammer or legit. However, i was in need of a room for my dad, and she had me meet her in a POPEYES. Yes you heard that right. On 172nd st and St. Nicholas. She didn’t look presentable at all and the paperwork she was going to have me fill out didn’t look neat or professional AT ALL. That’s when i pulled a stop and told her i didn’t need the room anymore and would call back if i changed my mind. I am desperate to find a room for my dad, but not desperate enough to get scammed by this lady in a Popeyes Fried Chicken spot. Thank god i came here and read the review. To put the nail in the coffin, after my meeting with her i drove to the office, the place is literally SHUT DOWN, the gate was half open, i looked inside and everything is in bags, and one sorry lonely desk is just sitting there. What this means is, if i would’ve gave her money today, and she so happened to scam me, i wouldn’t have a place to meet her tomorrow as she doesn’t operate from an office. Also it’s very easy to tell friends to leave 5 star reviews on here.

originalText.text: She is so bad, yes she will have enough rooms for you to see but she will lie in every aspect to get the money from you. And once there’s a problem she will not give you your money back. She’s a fraud taking money from everyone and everything, she will hustle you out until she can just to make sure to have her business up and running and not caring if you need a roof under your head! She has great acting skills, she’s not who she presents to be! please trust and believe !!! Never again !! I lost $470 with this women Suzy!

originalText.text:
I went there to go find a room to rent , I was the first person there and last to be seen . The woman who works their is a scammer. She takes advantage of non us citizens. They pay her ,and then she screws  them out of cash , because she's aware that they can't file a legal complaint .  My experience with the woman who runs the place there was awful. Her services is $150 +$150 security deposit (which you don't get back ,and goes directly into her pocket). I figured if I be okay with that ,then she would get me a room to rent ASAP. She said she can make that happen .She gives me two bogus phone # and tells me to be at an address at the first address at 7pm and 7:30p. . I go and find out there was no room to rent at both places.  So, I take a cab back to her so called office asap before she closes and demanded my money back . She Tell's me she can only give me $150 back , because I signed the agreement. I told her if I don't get back all my funds back ,I will file a complaint on her license,if she has license... immediately she gave back all my funds with no hesitation. She obviously doesn't want nobody screwing up her gig. If she would've been honest instead of being deceitful ,I would've gave her the benefit of the doubt and see if she can get me a room . I feel bad for the non citizens that get taken advantage there.So, I will be filing a complaint on this woman .
American Plaza must be investigated and shutdown immediately. One person there literally said " I've been waiting for a room for two months "  The woman also claims not to  speak or understand English ,she speaks and understands it fine.
